3 bit -> highest?

[1] [1] [1] -> 4 + 2 + 1 = 7
1 / 0

3 DIGIT highest 999

sizeof pointer -> 8 bytes = 8 * 8 = 64 bits

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111 = 2 ^ 64 - 1 = 1.844 x 10 ^ 19

32 bit operating system

111111111111111111111111111111111 = 4294967295 + 1 = 4294967296

111111111111111111111111111111111 + 1 = 00000000000000000000000000000000

429 496 7296 / 1024 = 4194304 kb
4194304 / 1024 = 4096 mb
/ 1024 = 1024

11111111 -> 255
11111111 + 1 = 00000000 -> 0

99 +1 = 00 -> 1900
